price: Onja! Ati wewe ndiye mwenye nguvu, mtukufu!
footnotes: Ataambiwa kwa kejeli na maskhara: Onja hii adhabu kali, kwani ati wewe si ndiye mtukufu mwenye nguvu katika kaumu yako, ndiye mheshimiwa unavyo jiona mwenyewe!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
